item.title: 04 19 21 Diary
item.author: Author
item.description: Today’s achievement: 阅读了一篇经济学人文章 完成了神经网络课程的大作业proposal 1. The Economists pragmatic: dealing with problems in a sensible, practical way instead of strictly follow a set of principles. Ross took a more pragmatic approach to management this problem. ill-fated: 不幸的，倒霉的 an ill-fated expedition 一场注定不成功的冒险 fascism: 法西斯主义 espouse: to support an idea, belife etc, especially a political one. He espouses a variety of scientific, social and political causes.
